tokens.resolved_gloss: to kneel; by implication to bless God (as an act of adoration), and (vice-versa) man (as a benefit); also (by euphemism) to curse (God or the king, as treason)
tokens.translation: to kneel; by implication to bless God (as an act of adoration), and (vice-versa) man (as a benefit); also (by euphemism) to curse (God or the king, as treason)

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, self (but generally used to point out more definitely the object of a verb or preposition, even or namely)
